Articles.Content: Hi, I know there are some possibilities to get custom sounds working ingame. The problem is: I don't know how. I tried it already with putting the sound file in the KSP/Sounds directory or KSP/GameData/Squad/Sounds, but that didn't helped. And it would be great if it would work without a plugin or module manager or whatever.. Has anybody got an idea?

depends what sounds. Most engine sounds are built-in. to use custom sounds you need to use ModuleEngineFX. IVA prop sounds are just full file paths to the sound clip you want to use, just have to edit the config files or use MM patch.
I want to install an Engine sound. I tried it with ModuleEngines, but that didn't worked out.
you need to use ModuleEngineFX; ModuleEngines will only use KSP's built-in sound and particle FX. check Rapier engine's config file and HotRockets thread on how to set up ModuleEngineFX.
